about_the_game:
This is a versatile glassware tileset.
This collection is designed to use easily with the tileset, including RPG Maker MZ.

Try to leverage this product to create a variety of landscape expressions, such as shops with stylish shop windows, dungeons with transparent floors, building walls, and partitions.

---------------------------------
◆Material
・tileset x１（tileset B recommended）

◆Sample project
・map x 4 (using this tileset)
---------------------------------

◆Notes.◆
※The buildings in the screenshots are the RPG Maker MZ tilesets.
Note: This product contains only the glass window tileset.
※When using the transparency feature, you should use the gait settings and the tileset layer feature.


・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series ONLY
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
